letters.description: Collaborate with the client to define therapeutic goals, assess current challenges, and identify how animal interaction can support desired outcomes.
Facilitate guided interactions with the therapy animal, carefully observing the client's responses, non-verbal cues, and the evolving human-animal bond.
Implement tailored animal-assisted interventions, process client experiences, and guide them in applying insights and skills gained from the interaction.
Reinforce positive changes, integrate learned strategies into daily life, and plan for sustained well-being through the lasting impact of the human-animal connection.
